msg.msgText:
A "TopicMonitor" composite object can be deleted using the "delete" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver delete TopicMonitor help imaserver delete TopicMonitor "TopicString=value"
EXAMPLE: imaserver delete TopicMonitor "TopicString=topic1"

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
